::Feline::

She hugged Hotrod and didn't let go. She cried on his shoulder.  "I'm 
sorry.  I....I try to not let it get to me.  But, every once in a 
while."  she sobbed "I remeber."  She held him close and sobbed aaain 
on his shoulder.
